mapper.select: select ceo.id as id, ceo.order_no as orderNo, ceo.status as status, ceo.recipient_name as recipient, ceo.created_time as createdTime, if(ceo.status != 2, detail.ata, null) as completeTime from cor_express_delivery_detail detail left join cor_express_delivery ced on detail.express_delivery_id = ced.id and ced.dr = 0 left join cor_express_order ceo on ceo.id = detail.express_order_id and ceo.dr = 0 left join cor_driver driver on driver.id = ced.driver_id and driver.dr = 0 where detail.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and detail.dr = 0 and ceo.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and ced.driver_id =#{id} order by detail.ata desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from cor_express_delivery delivery left join cor_driver driver on delivery.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 where driver.user_id = #{userId} and driver.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and to_days(delivery.delivery_date) = to_days(now()) and delivery.status in (1, 2)

select delivery.driven_mileage from cor_express_delivery delivery left join cor_driver driver on delivery.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 where driver.user_id = #{userId} and driver.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and to_days(delivery.delivery_date) = to_days(now()) and delivery.status in (1, 2)
